Latest News

View All

  1. Spring has Sprung in El Mirage! Come Join the Fun at the Spring Faire!

    The City of El Mirage will host its annual Spring Faire on Saturday, April 13, 2019 from 9:00 a.m. – 1:00 p.m. at Gateway Park, 10100 North El Mirage Road. Read on...

  2. Cives Steel Plans New Facility In El Mirage


    [El Mirage, AZ March 15, 2019] - Cives Steel Company announced a purchase of 25 acres at CenterPoint Logistics Park in El Mirage for their 8th North American facility. Read on...

  3. Plan the Future of Transportation!


    The Maricopa Association of Governments (MAG) is asking individuals who live or work in the Maricopa County region to complete a survey about what they value about our regional transportation system. Read on...

  4. ADOT Improvement project along US 60 frontage road in El Mirage will require lane restrictions


    The Arizona Department of Transportation is starting a project to reconstruct and improve the US 60 frontage road between Greenway and Thunderbird in El Mirage. Drivers using the frontage road should take alternate routes while work is underway. Read on...
